speaker: Alice
content: Dr. Albert Goldfine was the most accomplished marriage counselor in the city.
mark: accomplished adj. 熟练的，才华高的；娴于社交的；v. 完成，实现（accomplish 的过去式和过去分词）

speaker: Alice
content: He had dealt with problems ranging from substance abuse to infidelity, to domestic violence.
mark: range from ... to ... 范围从……到……
substance abuse 吸毒,物质滥用  substance n. 物质，材料；主旨；重要性；真实性，可信性；毒品；财产；实质， abuse v/n. 虐待；滥用，辜负；辱骂
infidelity n. 无信仰，不信神；背信；不忠行为，婚外情

speaker: Alice
content: Yes, Dr. Goldfine thought he had seen it all. And then he met the Van De Kamp’s.
mark: see it all 看尽一切

speaker: Bree
content: Hi. I'm Bree. And this is my husband Rex. And I brought you some homemade potpourri.
mark: homemade adj. 自制的，家里做的；国产的
potpourri n. 百花香；混合物；杂曲；大杂烩

speaker: Rex
content: The answer is yes. You're about to make a fortune off us.
mark: The answer is yes. 答案是肯定的
be about to 即将要做某事
make a fortune off us 从我们身上赚大钱  make sth off sb 从某人身上抢走某物  make a fortune 发财，赚大钱
fortune n. 时运，命运；好运，机遇；财富，巨款；未来，前途
